function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of threshold for classification based on IoU","Impact":"Misclassification of detections leading to incorrect predictions","Mitigation":"Utilize multiple thresholds or non-threshold based classification methods","Technologies":"Machine learning models with adaptive classification thresholds","People":"Machine learning practitioners, researchers","Owner":"Data science teams, research institutions"},{"Description":"False positive predictions due to IoU threshold","Impact":"Inaccurate detection of objects leading to misinterpretation of results","Mitigation":"Use additional post-processing techniques to filter false positives","Technologies":"Post-processing algorithms for false positive reduction","People":"Data scientists, computer vision researchers","Owner":"AI research and development teams"},{"Description":"False negative predictions due to IoU threshold","Impact":"Failure to detect objects leading to incomplete or incorrect analysis","Mitigation":"Utilize ensemble methods or cascaded detection approaches to improve object detection","Technologies":"Ensemble learning techniques, cascaded object detection algorithms","People":"Machine learning engineers, data analysts","Owner":"AI development and research teams"}]}
